001package gust.backend.model;
002
003import com.google.protobuf.Message;
004import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
005import javax.annotation.Nullable;
006
007
008/** Thrown when a write operation fails, because of some conflict situation. */
009public final class ModelWriteConflict extends ModelWriteFailure {
010  /** Expectation that was violated during the write operation. */
011  private final @Nonnull WriteOptions.WriteDisposition failedExpectation;
012
013  /**
014   * Create a model write exception with a throwable as a cause.
015   *
016   * @param key   Key for the record that failed to write.
017   * @param model Model that failed to write.
018   * @param expectation Expectation that failed to be met.
019   */
020  public ModelWriteConflict(@Nullable Object key,
021                            @Nonnull Message model,
022                            @Nonnull WriteOptions.WriteDisposition expectation) {
023    super(key, model, String.format(
024      "Cannot write to the specified model. Key %s did not meet expectation %s.",
025      key,
026      expectation.name()));
027    this.failedExpectation = expectation;
028  }
029
030  // -- Getters -- //
031  /** @return Expectation that was violated, when the error was encountered. */
032  public @Nonnull WriteOptions.WriteDisposition getFailedExpectation() {
033    return failedExpectation;
034  }
035}
